agents.name: Claude Code

agents.description: AI pair programming in your terminal supporting most LLMs

agents.name: Cursor
agents.description: AI-first code editor built on VS Code

agents.name: Windsurf
agents.description: Agentic AI IDE by Codeium with the Cascade multi-file reasoning system

agents.name: Qwen Code
agents.description: Alibaba's open-source terminal coding agent powered by Qwen3-Coder

agents.name: Kimi Code
agents.description: Moonshot AI's coding agent for the terminal and VS Code

agents.name: Plandex
agents.description: Open source terminal AI coding agent designed for large projects and complex tasks

agents.name: Zed

agents.description: Google's agent-first AI IDE that orchestrates multiple AI agents in parallel

agents.name: Cline

agents.name: Goose
agents.description: Open source extensible AI developer agent by Block (Square)

agents.name: Roo Code
agents.description: AI dev team of agents built into VS Code, fork of Cline

agents.name: Kilo Code

agents.name: Trae

agents.name: OpenClaw

agents.name: Kiro

agents.name: Pi

agents.name: Neovate Code
agents.description: Open source AI code agent by Ant Group supporting 20+ providers

agents.name: Zencoder
agents.description: AI coding agent platform with CI/CD integration and workflow orchestration

agents.name: Amp
agents.description: AI coding agent for teams by Sourcegraph with CLI and VS Code extension

agents.name: Qoder

agents.name: Command Code

agents.name: Amazon Q Developer

agents.name: Devin
agents.description: Cognition's autonomous AI software engineer that handles full development workflows

agents.name: Augment Code
agents.description: AI coding agent with deep codebase understanding, ranked #1 on SWE-bench Verified

agents.name: Replit Agent
agents.description: Autonomous web app builder that builds, tests, and fixes apps from natural language

notes: crush is the successor to OpenCode, built by Charmbracelet after the original creator joined them
clawdbot evolved into OpenClaw after going through several name changes
qwen and qoder are both Alibaba products but serve different purposes (CLI agent vs. full IDE platform)
